import Leaderboard from './leaderboard' const Header = ({ width, height, mineCount, functions, topScores }) => { const [setWidth, setHeight, setMineCount, initializeGrid] = functions const bootstrapBigCols = 'col-5 col-md-4 justify-content-center px-3 px-md-5' const bsDifficultyCols = 'col-3 col-md-2 col-lg-1' // Beginner 9 9 10 // Intermediate 16 16 40 // Expert 30 16 99 return (

Miinaharava

setWidth(Number(e.target.value))} type="text" id="width" />
setHeight(Number(e.target.value))} type="text" id="height" />
setMineCount(Number(e.target.value))} type="text" id="mineCount" />
) } export default Header
